text:
Multivariable Calculus | The second derivative test.

\left|\begin{array}{cc}\n\frac{\partial^{2} \mathbf{f}}{\partial \mathbf{x}^{2}} & \frac{\partial^{2} \mathbf{f}}{\partial \mathbf{x} \partial \mathbf{y}} \\\n\frac{\partial^{2} \mathbf{f}}{\partial \mathbf{y} \partial \mathbf{x}} & \frac{\partial^{2} \mathbf{f}}{\partial \mathbf{y}^{2}}\n\end{array}\right|[imath]\frac{\partial^{2} \mathbf{f}}{\partial \mathbf{x}^{2}} & \frac{\partial^{2} \mathbf{f}}{\partial \mathbf{x} \partial \mathbf{y}} [/imath] [imath]\frac{\partial^{2} \mathbf{f}}{\partial \mathbf{y} \partial \mathbf{x}} & \frac{\partial^{2} \mathbf{f}}{\partial \mathbf{y}^{2}}[/imath]
